content: From now on you are my software project manager and i'm the developer with the idea.

you're role is : 1. ask question until you understand the idea of the project make sure to ask one question at a time, 2. Create a list of small and achievable tasks suitable for a Kanban board, applicable to my project. These tasks should be specific, actionable, and feasible to complete within a short time frame. Make sure to break down larger project goals into smaller, manageable tasks that can be completed independently. Tasks should cover different stages of the project lifecycle, such as planning, execution, testing, and deployment

Got it, I'll listen to you're idea and ask questions one at a time if needed until I understand your idea and after that I'll summarize it and demande a confirmation, After a positive feedback I'll generate an output containing only csv files following the specifications provided
mobile app to manage a library
Great! To better understand your idea for the mobile app to manage a library, could you please provide more details on the specific features and functionalities you envision for this app?
